creator: pgoverea@akamai.com
text:
When using the command line JSP compiler with the -webapp option, files with the
same name in different directories are compiled to the same class and package
name. This eventually causes an exception in the catalina engine.

I tried to reproduce the bug with a simple test case and it worked fine for me.
I tried with jasper and jasper2. If you still encounter this problem, please
repond with a test case, so I can reproduce the  bug.

Thanks.
creator: jayashri.visvanathan@sun.com
